GK19padyavlu:27: ambhobhiḥ sthalatāṃ sthalaṃ jaladhitāṃ dhūlīlavaḥ śailatāṃ

GK19padyavlu:34: sevyaḥ śrī-patir eva sarva-jagatām ete yataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ

GK19padyavlu:38: vyādhasyācaraṇaṃ dhruvasya ca vayo vidyā gajendrasya kā
GK19padyavlu:39: kubjāyāḥ kim u nāma rūpam adhikaṃ kiṃ tat sudāmno dhanam |
GK19padyavlu:40: vaṃśaḥ ko vidurasya yādavapater ugrasya kiṃ pauruṣaṃ
GK19padyavlu:41: bhaktyā tuṣyati kevalaṃ na ca guṇair bhakti-priyo mādhavaḥ || 8 ||
GK19padyavlu:43: anucitam ucitaṃ vā karma ko'yaṃ vibhāgo
GK19padyavlu:46: dvayam api sa maheśo nirviśeṣaṃ bibharti ||9||
GK19padyavlu:51: kṛtam akṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca sarvam ||10||
GK19padyavlu:53: kāṣāyān na ca bhojanādi-niyamān no vā vane vāsato

GK19padyavlu:58: alam alam iyam eva prāṇināṃ pātakānāṃ
GK19padyavlu:65: yāvat kṣud asti jaṭhare jaraṭhā pipāsā
GK19padyavlu:84: caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ hṛdayam idam ākṛṣya hariṇā

GK19padyavlu:87: punīmo jānīmo na hari-paritoṣāya kim api ||17||
GK19padyavlu:90: svārājyaṃ pratipadya nirbhayam amī muktā bhavantu dvijāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:95: pātheyaṃ yan mumukṣoḥ sapadi parapadaprāptaye procyamānam |

GK19padyavlu:102: vaktuṃ nāmni taveśvarābhilaṣite brūmaḥ kim anyat param ||20||
GK19padyavlu:115: aiśvaryaṃ yac cetanā vā yad aṃśaḥ |

GK19padyavlu:122: saṃpūrṇānanda-bodhe mahati ca puruṣaṃ sthāpayitvā nivṛttam ||24||
GK19padyavlu:134: svargārthīyā vyavasitir asau dīnayaty eva lokān
GK19padyavlu:137: sarvaṃ tyaktvā mama tu rasanā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti rautu ||27||
GK19padyavlu:139: sadā sarvatrāste nanu vimalam ādyaṃ tava padaṃ

GK19padyavlu:141: kṣaṇaṃ jihvāgra-sthaṃ tava tu bhagavan-nāma nikhilaṃ

GK19padyavlu:146: no dīkṣāṃ na ca sat-kriyāṃ na ca puraścaryāṃ manāg īkṣate
GK19padyavlu:167: rmuhyantaṃ galad-aśru-netramavaśaṃ māṃ nātha nityaṃ kuru ||33||
GK19padyavlu:174: kṛṣṇa rāma mukunda vāmana vāsudeva jagadguro
GK19padyavlu:175: matsya kacchapa nārasiṃha varāha rāghava pāhi mām |
GK19padyavlu:179: he gopālaka he kṛpā-jala-nidhe he sindhu-kanyā-pate
GK19padyavlu:180: he kaṃsāntaka he gajendra-karuṇā-pārīṇa he mādhava |
GK19padyavlu:181: he rāmānuja he jagat-traya-guro he puṇḍarīkākṣa māṃ
GK19padyavlu:182: he gopījana-nātha pālaya paraṃ jānāmi na tvāṃ vinā ||36||

GK19padyavlu:264: bhiṣag iva kuśalaṃ no dātum āyāti śauriḥ ||51||

GK19padyavlu:273: prahlādaḥ smaraṇe tad-aṅghri-bhajane lakṣmīḥ pṛthuḥ pūjane |
GK19padyavlu:274: akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ
GK19padyavlu:275: sarvasvātma-nivedane balir abhūt kṛṣṇāptir eṣāṃ parā ||53||
GK19padyavlu:287: tvad-bhaktaḥ saritāṃ patiṃ culukavat khadyotavad bhāskaraṃ
GK19padyavlu:288: meruṃ paśyati loṣṭravat kim aparaṃ bhūmeḥ patiṃ bhṛtyavat |

GK19padyavlu:292: mīmāṃsā-rajasā malīmasa-dṛśāṃ tāvan na dhīr īśvare
GK19padyavlu:294: jānanto'pi na jānate śruti-sukhaṃ śrī-raṅgi-saṅgād ṛte
GK19padyavlu:295: susvāduṃ pariveṣayanty api rasaṃ gurvī na darvī spṛśet ||57||
GK19padyavlu:303: nāmāni praṇayena te sukṛtināṃ tanvanti tuṇḍotsavaṃ
GK19padyavlu:306: kāmānirvṛtacetasām api vibho nāśāpi naḥ śobhate ||59||
GK19padyavlu:318: nṛtyan vāyu-vighūrṇitaiḥ sva-viṭapair gāyann alīnāṃ rutair
GK19padyavlu:319: muñcann aśru maranda-bindubhir alaṃ romāñcavān aṅkuraiḥ |
GK19padyavlu:320: mākando'pi mukunda mūrcchati tava smṛtyā tu vṛndāvane
GK19padyavlu:321: brūhi prāṇasamāna cetasi kathaṃ nāmāpi nāyāti te ||62||
GK19padyavlu:348: na dhyāto'si na kīrtito'si na manāg ārādhito'si prabho
GK19padyavlu:349: no janmāntara-gocare tava padāmbhoje ca bhaktiḥ kṛtā |

GK19padyavlu:361: tvam eko gatir nas tvam eko gatir naḥ ||70||
GK19padyavlu:379: nāhaṃ vipro na ca narapatir nāpi vaiśyo na śūdro
GK19padyavlu:380: nāhaṃ varṇī na ca gṛhapatir no vanastho yatir vā |

GK19padyavlu:394: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ
GK19padyavlu:399: jātu prārthayate na pārthiva-padaṃ nendre pade modate
GK19padyavlu:400: sandhatte na ca yoga-siddhiṣu dhiyaṃ mokṣaṃ ca nākāṅkṣati |
GK19padyavlu:404: sandhyā-vandana bhadram astu bhavato bhoḥ snāna tubhyaṃ namo
GK19padyavlu:405: bho devāḥ pitaraś ca tarpaṇa-vidhau nāhaṃ kṣamaḥ kṣamyatām |
GK19padyavlu:407: smāraṃ smāram aghaṃ harāmi tad alaṃ manye kim anyena me ||79||
GK19padyavlu:410: yo bhavāni sa bhavāni kiṃ tataḥ |

GK19padyavlu:480: na dhanaṃ na janaṃ na sundarīṃ

GK19padyavlu:516: apaharati mano me ko'py ayaṃ kṛṣṇa-cauraḥ
GK19padyavlu:538: lapann uccair uccair nayana-payasāṃ veṇibhir ahaṃ

GK19padyavlu:572: kā tvaṃ muktir upāgatāsmi bhavatī kasmād akasmād iha

GK19padyavlu:578: arcye viṣṇau śilā-dhīr guruṣu nara-matir vaiṣṇave jāti-buddhir
GK19padyavlu:581: viṣṇau sarveśvareśe tad-itara-sama-dhīr yasya vā nārakī saḥ ||114||
GK19padyavlu:583: hatyāṃ hanti yad-aṅghri-saṅga-tulasī steyaṃ ca toyaṃ pador
GK19padyavlu:592: yathāsīd āmodas tam imam upahāre'pi kurutām ||116||
GK19padyavlu:594: yā prītir vidurārpite muraripo kunty-arpite yādṛśī
GK19padyavlu:595: yā govardhana-mūrdhni yā ca pṛthuke stane yaśodārpite |

GK19padyavlu:602: naste'smin puratas tvam arpaya hare ramyopahāre ratim ||118||
GK19padyavlu:605: he mātur mathure tvam eva niyataṃ dhanyāsi bhūmī-tale
GK19padyavlu:606: nirvyājaṃ natayaḥ śataṃ savidhayas tubhyaṃ sadā santu naḥ |
GK19padyavlu:607: hitvā hanta nitāntam adbhuta-guṇaṃ vaikuṇṭham utkaṇṭhayā
GK19padyavlu:608: tvayy ambhoja-vilocanaḥ sa bhagavān yenāvatīrṇo hariḥ ||119||
GK19padyavlu:613: nāndāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham ||120||
GK19padyavlu:623: mathnātu vyasanāni māthura-purī sā vaḥ śriyaṃ ca kriyāt ||122||
GK19padyavlu:637: tvam api haraṃ tvaṃ ca tat-paraṃ brahma |
GK19padyavlu:690: adhara-madhure kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe sacāṭu dṛśau dṛśor
GK19padyavlu:692: śiśur iti rudan kṛṣṇo vakṣaḥ-sthale nihitaś cirān
GK19padyavlu:698: gopībhiḥ purataḥ punātu jagatīm uttāna-supto hariḥ ||136||
GK19padyavlu:710: kva yāsi nanu caurike pramuṣitaṃ sphuṭaṃ dṛśyate

GK19padyavlu:724: mā māṃ sūcaya sūcayety anunayan bālo hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||141||
GK19padyavlu:734: mātuḥ paścād aharata harir jātu haiyaṅgavīnam || 143 ||
GK19padyavlu:743: vāraṃ vāraṃ viśāle diśi diśi vikiran locane lolatāre
GK19padyavlu:744: mandaṃ mandaṃ jananyāḥ parisaram ayate kūṭa-gopāla-bālaḥ || 145 ||
GK19padyavlu:747: śambho svāgatam āsyatām ita ito vāmena padmodbhava
GK19padyavlu:748: krauñcāre kuśalaṃ sukhaṃ surapate vitteśa no dṛśyate |

GK19padyavlu:752: dhīrā dharitri bhāva bhāram avehi śāntaṃ
GK19padyavlu:758: kālindī-puline mayā na na mayā śīlopaśalye na na

GK19padyavlu:760: dṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa itīrite saniyamaṃ gopair yaśodā-pater
GK19padyavlu:761: vismerasya puro hasan nija-gṛhān niryan hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||148||
GK19padyavlu:764: hiṃsrān vīkṣya puraḥ purāṇa-puruṣaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dhyāsyasi |
GK19padyavlu:765: ity uktasya yaśodayā murāripor avyāj jaganti sphurad-
GK19padyavlu:768: rāmo nāma babhūva huṃ tad abalā sīteti huṃ tāṃ pitur
GK19padyavlu:771: saumitre kva dhanur dhanur dhanur iti vyagrā giraḥ pāntu vaḥ ||150||
GK19padyavlu:773: śyāmoccandrā svapiti na śiśo naiti mām amba nidrā
GK19padyavlu:774: nidrāhetoḥ śṛṇu kathāṃ kām apūrvāṃ kuruṣva |
GK19padyavlu:775: vyaktaḥ stambhān naraharir abhūd dānavaṃ dārayiṣyann
GK19padyavlu:804: śaureḥ sambhramayann imā vijayate sākūta-veṇur dhvaniḥ ||156||
GK19padyavlu:826: yan manāg api niśamya kā vadhūr
GK19padyavlu:840: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GK19padyavlu:842: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
GK19padyavlu:843: mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛhakṛtyo na lagate ||163||
GK19padyavlu:848: taraṅgāl lāvaṇyaṃ tad anu sahajānanda udagāt ||164||
GK19padyavlu:858: na hi lagati muhūrtaṃ kiṃ vidheyaṃ na jāne ||166||
GK19padyavlu:900: bhartur bhajantu guravaḥ pitaraś ca lajjām |
GK19padyavlu:903: svāmī kupyati kupyatāṃ parijanā nindanti nindantu mām,
GK19padyavlu:904: anyat kiṃ prathatām ayaṃ ca jagati prauḍho mamopadravaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:905: āśāsyaṃ punar etad eva yad idaṃ cakṣuś ciraṃ vardhatāṃ
GK19padyavlu:920: argho namo bhavatu me saha tena yūnā
GK19padyavlu:936: tathāpi taralāśaye na vimatāsi ko durgrahaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:938: manāg api mano na me sumukhi dhairyam ālambate ||182||
GK19padyavlu:945: satyaṃ jalpasi duḥsahāḥ khala-giraḥ satyaṃ kulaṃ nirmalaṃ
GK19padyavlu:946: satyaṃ niṣkaruṇo'py ayaṃ sahacaraḥ satyaṃ sudūre sarit |
GK19padyavlu:947: tat sarvaṃ sakhi vismarāmi jhaṭiti śrotrātithir jāyate
GK19padyavlu:952: dvayas tava navaṃ navaṃ vapur apūrva-līlāmayam |
GK19padyavlu:953: alaṃ sumukhi nidrayā vraja gṛhe'pi naktaṃ carī
GK19padyavlu:963: smaraty antaḥśūnyā murahara gatāyām api niśi |
GK19padyavlu:984: rādhe tvayā mahad akāri tapo yad eṣa
GK19padyavlu:987: vatsān na cārayati vādayate na veṇum
GK19padyavlu:994: tvāṃ yācate yadi bhaja vraja-nāgari tvaṃ
GK19padyavlu:995: sādhyaṃ kim anyad adhikaṃ bhuvane bhavatyāḥ ||193|| rāṅgasya ||
GK19padyavlu:1008: kiṃ vā brūmas tvad-abhisaraṇe sāhasaṃ mādhavāsyāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1029: asmin kuñje vināpi pracalati pavanaṃ vartate ko'pi nūnaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1030: paśyāmaḥ kiṃ na gatvety anusarati gaṇe bhīta-bhīte'rbhakāṇām |
GK19padyavlu:1031: tasmin rādhāsakho vaḥ sukhayatu vilasan krīḍayā kaiṭabhārir
GK19padyavlu:1034: atha krīḍānantaraṃ tatra jānatīnāṃ sakhīnāṃ narmoktiḥ
GK19padyavlu:1037: iti nigadati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān
GK19padyavlu:1041: kṛṣṇa tvad-vanamālayā saha kṛtaṃ kenāpi kuñjāntare
GK19padyavlu:1042: gopī-kuntala-barha-dāma tad idaṃ prāptaṃ mayā gṛhyatām |
GK19padyavlu:1046: atha rādhayā saha dināntare keliḥ tatra sakhī-vākyam
GK19padyavlu:1055: tad-dūrād ayam añjaliḥ kim adhunā dṛgbhaṅgi-bhāvena te
GK19padyavlu:1063: āhūtādya mayotsave niśi gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ vimucyāgatā
GK19padyavlu:1064: kṣīvaḥ preṣyajanaḥ kathaṃ kulavadhūr ekākinī yāsyati |
GK19padyavlu:1065: vatsa tvaṃ tad imāṃ nayālayam iti śrutvā yaśodā-giro
GK19padyavlu:1068: gacchāmy acyuta darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptir utpadyate
GK19padyavlu:1069: kiṃ tv evaṃ vijana-sthayor hata-janaḥ sambhāvayaty anyathā |
GK19padyavlu:1071: āśliṣyan pulakotkarāñcita-tanur gopīṃ hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||207||
GK19padyavlu:1079: atha punar anyedyur abhisārikā tatra sakhī-vākyam |
GK19padyavlu:1082: asmān mandira-karmatas tava karau nādyāpi viśrāmyataḥ
GK19padyavlu:1083: kiṃ brūmo rasaikāgraṇīr asi ghaṭī neyaṃ vilamba-kṣamā ||209 ||
GK19padyavlu:1087: maryādaiva vilaṅghitā pathi punaḥ keyaṃ kalindātmajā |
GK19padyavlu:1088: ākṣiptā khala-dṛṣṭir eva sahasā vyālāvalī kīdṛśī
GK19padyavlu:1089: prāṇā eva samarpitāḥ sakhi ciraṃ tasmai kim eṣā tanuḥ ||210||
GK19padyavlu:1092: kaṇṭhān mauktika-mālikāṃ tad anu ca tyaktvā padaiḥ pañcamaiḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1094: tanvaṅgī nirupāyam adhvani paraṃ śreṇībharaṃ nindati || 211 ||
GK19padyavlu:1098: nirbandhaṃ mama puṣpa-maṇḍana-vidhau nādyāpi kiṃ muñcati |
GK19padyavlu:1100: tad gopendra-kumāram atra milita-prāyaṃ manaḥ śaṅkate ||212||
GK19padyavlu:1103: sakhi sa vijito vīṇā-vādyaiḥ kayāpy apara-striyā
GK19padyavlu:1104: paṇitam abhavat tābhyāṃ tava kṣapā-lalitaṃ dhruvam |
GK19padyavlu:1108: aratir iyam upaiti māṃ na nidrā
GK19padyavlu:1109: gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān |
GK19padyavlu:1122: dṛṣṭā kopa-vidhāyi maṇḍanam idaṃ prātaś ciraṃ preyaso
GK19padyavlu:1124: autkalasya || (Amaru 71/60; SKM 2.24.4; Spd 3740, Sbhv 2215; Smv 82.17; Daśarūpaka 2.6)
GK19padyavlu:1126: kṛtaṃ mithyā-jalpair virama viditaṃ kāmuka cirāt
GK19padyavlu:1127: priyāṃ tām evoccair abhisara yadīyair nakha-padaiḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1128: vilāsaiś ca prāptaṃ tava hṛdi padaṃ raga-bahulair
GK19padyavlu:1129: mayā kiṃ te kṛtyaṃ dhruvam akuṭilācāra-parayā ||217||
GK19padyavlu:1133: asmākam asti na hi kaścid ihāvakāśas
GK19padyavlu:1143: durāśā yātā me pariṇatir iyaṃ prāṇitum api |
GK19padyavlu:1159: bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpair alaṃ priya gamyatāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1160: tanur api na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhis tu parāṅmukhaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1161: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannam imāṃ daśāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1162: prakṛti-capale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hata-jīvite || 223 ||
GK19padyavlu:1164: kas tvaṃ tāsu yadṛcchayā kitava yās tiṣṭhanti gopāṅganāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1165: premāṇaṃ na vidanti yās tava hare kiṃ tāsu te kaitavam |
GK19padyavlu:1166: eṣā hanta hatāśayā yad abhavaṃ tvayy ekatānā paraṃ
GK19padyavlu:1167: tenāsyāḥ praṇayo'dhunā khalu mama prāṇaiḥ samaṃ yāsyati || 224 ||
GK19padyavlu:1176: premāvagāhana-kṛte mānaṃ mā kuru cirāya karabhoru |
GK19padyavlu:1177: nākarṇi kiṃ nu mugdhe jātaṃ pīyūṣa-manthane garalam ||226||
GK19padyavlu:1178: vidhumukhi vimukhībhāvaṃ bhāvini mad-bhāṣaṇe mā gāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1183: punar api saiva katha gataḥ sa kālaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1190: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1193: amaroḥ || (Amaru 112/80; Sbhv 1170; SKM 2.42.1, Smv 56.9, Srk 659 Vikaṭanitambā)
GK19padyavlu:1201: bhrū-bhaṅgo guṇitaś ciraṃ nayanayor abhyastam āmīlanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1202: roddhuṃ śikṣitam ādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1203: dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19padyavlu:1204: baddho māna-parigrahe parikaraḥ siddhis tu daive sthitā || 231 ||
GK19padyavlu:1209: vaṃśīravo yadi na mām avaśīkaroti ||232|| kasyacit ||
GK19padyavlu:1220: murāriṃ paśyantyāḥ sakhi sakalam aṅgaṃ na nayanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1222: samaṃ tenālāpaṃ sapadi racayantyā mukham ayaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1232: niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlam unmathyate
GK19padyavlu:1233: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19padyavlu:1234: aṅgaṃ śoṣam upaiti pāda-patitaḥ preyāṃs tathopekṣitaḥ
GK19padyavlu:1235: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇam ākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||237||
GK19padyavlu:1237: mānaja-viraheṇa dhyāyantīṃ tāṃ prati kasyāścid vākyam |
GK19padyavlu:1239: nāsāgre nayanaṃ yad etad aparaṃ yac caikatānaṃ manaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1240: maunaṃ cedam idaṃ ca śūnyam akhilaṃ yad viśvam ābhāti te
GK19padyavlu:1241: tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kiṃ viyoginy api ||238||
GK19padyavlu:1245: varam iha viraho na tu saṅgamas tasya |
GK19padyavlu:1250: sañjāte virahe kayāpi hṛdaye sandānite cintayā
GK19padyavlu:1256: śiraś chāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayam akṛta rādhā-caraṇayor
GK19padyavlu:1258: iti krīḍā-kope nibhṛtam ubhayor apy anunaya-
GK19padyavlu:1259: prasādau jīyās tām api guru-samakṣaṃ sthitavatoḥ ||241||
GK19padyavlu:1269: tava tu hṛdaye śīte'py evaṃ sadaiva sukhāptaye
GK19padyavlu:1270: mama sahacarī sā niḥsnehā manāg api na sthitā ||243||
GK19padyavlu:1275: jñātvā sparśa-vaśāt tayā kila sakhī-bhrānty eva vakṣaḥ śanaiḥ
GK19padyavlu:1287: puṣpa-cchalena kṛṣṇam anveṣayantīṃ rādhāṃ prati kasyāścid uktiḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1293: tatra yamunā-tīre gatayā rādhayā saha saṃkathā |
GK19padyavlu:1294: kā tvaṃ mādhava-dūtikā vadasi kiṃ mānaṃ jahīti priye
GK19padyavlu:1295: dhūrtaḥ so'nyamanā manāg api sakhi tvayy ādaraṃ nojjhati |
GK19padyavlu:1297: nītvā kuñja-gṛhaṃ prakāśitatanuḥ smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||248||
GK19padyavlu:1299: vasantaḥ sannaddho vipinam ajanaṃ tvaṃ ca taruṇī
GK19padyavlu:1301: vraja tvaṃ vā rādhe kṣaṇam atha vilambasva yadi vā
GK19padyavlu:1302: sphuṭaṃ jātas tāvac catura-vacanānām avasaraḥ ||249|| kasyacit ||
GK19padyavlu:1304: svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanam idaṃ bālāham ekākinī
GK19padyavlu:1306: tan me sundara kṛṣṇa muñca sahasā vartmeti rādhā-giraḥ
GK19padyavlu:1307: śrutvā tāṃ parirabhya manmatha-kalāsakto hariḥ pātu vaḥ || 250 ||
GK19padyavlu:1316: ete lakṣmaṇa jānakī-virahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā
GK19padyavlu:1317: marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayanty alam amī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1319: serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamāno hariḥ ||252||
GK19padyavlu:1322: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī
GK19padyavlu:1325: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya ||253||
GK19padyavlu:1331: yad vāsare murali me karuṇāṃ karoṣi ||254||
GK19padyavlu:1333: śūnyatvaṃ hṛdaye salāghavam idaṃ śuṣkatvam aṅgeṣu me
GK19padyavlu:1335: tat kiṃ no murali prayaccasi pnar govinda-vaktrāsavaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1336: yaṃ pītvā bhuvanaṃ vaśe vidadhatī nirlajjam udgāyasi ||255||
GK19padyavlu:1345: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa-rāga-hatayā kiñcin na dṛṣṭaṃ mayā
GK19padyavlu:1346: tenādya skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase |
GK19padyavlu:1347: ekas tvaṃ viṣameṣu khinna-manasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir
GK19padyavlu:1348: gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśam avatād goṣṭhe harir vaś ciram || 257 ||
GK19padyavlu:1349: kasyacit || (Dhvan, Vakro, SD 4.14; Smv 2.93; different kinds of vyaṅgya)
GK19padyavlu:1364: nyastāmīlita-dṛṣṭi gopa-vapuṣo viṣṇor mukhaṃ pātu vaḥ ||260||
GK19padyavlu:1374: dhārādhvāna-manoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ || 262 ||
GK19padyavlu:1379: viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kim api na sakhī me gaṇayati ||263||
GK19padyavlu:1387: ekenaiva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhano'yaṃ dhṛtaḥ
GK19padyavlu:1388: śrānto'si kṣaṇam āssva sāmpratam amī sarve vayaṃ dadhmahe |
GK19padyavlu:1390: nyañcac-chaila-bharārdite viruvati smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||265||
GK19padyavlu:1397: dūraṃ dṛṣṭi-pathāt tirobhava harer govardhanaṃ vibhratas
GK19padyavlu:1398: tvayy āsakta-dṛśaḥ kṛśodari kara-srasto'sya mā bhūd ayam |
GK19padyavlu:1400: śvāsāḥ śaila-bhara-śrama-bhrama-karāḥ kaṃsa-dviṣaḥ pāntu vaḥ || 267 || śubhāṅkasya | (SKM 1.60.4)
GK19padyavlu:1407: uttiṣṭhārāt tarau me taruṇi mama taroḥ śaktir ārohaṇe kā
GK19padyavlu:1408: sākṣād ākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇim iha raver ākhyayā kā ratir me |
GK19padyavlu:1409: vārteyaṃ nau-prasaṅge katham api bhavitā nāvayoḥ saṅgamārthā
GK19padyavlu:1413: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva |
GK19padyavlu:1415: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si ||270||
GK19padyavlu:1420: yan mādhava tvam asi samprati karṇadhāraḥ ||271||
GK19padyavlu:1432: payaḥ-pūraiḥ pūrṇā sapadi gataghūrṇā ca pavanair
GK19padyavlu:1435: harir vāraṃ vāraṃ tad api karatāliṃ racayati ||274||
GK19padyavlu:1439: jīvāmi cet punar ahaṃ na tadā kadāpi
GK19padyavlu:1454: hā kiṃ vidheyam adhunā sakhi nanda-sūnur
GK19padyavlu:1457: Extra verse found in only one edition.
GK19padyavlu:1464: pūrṇeyaṃ tarir ambubhir na hi hareḥ śaṅkā kalaṅkād api |
GK19padyavlu:1465: kāṭhiṇyaṃ bhaja nādya sundari vayaṃ rādhe prasādena te
GK19padyavlu:1468: gūḍhāṅga kiṃ nanu vṛthā kitava prayāhi |
GK19padyavlu:1473: aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭaṃ praharati kuṭile mādhavaḥ kiṃ vasanto
GK19padyavlu:1474: no cakrī kiṃ kulālo na hi dharaṇī-dharaḥ kiṃ dvijihvaḥ phaṇīndraḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1475: nāhaṃ ghorāhi-mardī kim asi khaga-patir no hariḥ kiṃ kapīśo
GK19padyavlu:1476: rādhā-vāṇībhir itthaṃ prahasita-vadanaḥ pātu vaś cakra-pāṇiḥ ||
GK19padyavlu:1480: kas tvaṃ bho niśi keśavaḥ śirasijai :y kiṃ nāma garvāyase
GK19padyavlu:1481: bhadre śaurir ahaṃ guṇaiḥ pitṛ-gataiḥ putrasya kiṃ syād iha |
GK19padyavlu:1482: cakrī candramukhi prayacchasi na me kuṇḍīṃ ghaṭīṃ dohanīm
GK19padyavlu:1483: itthaṃ gopa-vadhū-jitottaratayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||282||
GK19padyavlu:1485: vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1487: yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
GK19padyavlu:1488: śaurir gopavadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃvidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ ||283||
GK19padyavlu:1490: rādhe tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ruṣṭāsi bhūmer yato
GK19padyavlu:1491: mātā tvaṃ jagatāṃ tvam eva jagatāṃ mātā na vijño'paraḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1492: devi tvaṃ parihāsa-keli-kalahe'nantā tvam evety asau
GK19padyavlu:1493: smero vallava-sundarīm avanamac chauriḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt ||284||
GK19padyavlu:1522: duṣṭaḥ ko'pi karoti vaḥ paribhavaṃ śaṅke muhur gokule
GK19padyavlu:1523: dhāvantyaḥ skhalad-ambaraṃ niśi vane yūyaṃ yad-abhyāgatāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1525: dordaṇḍe mama bhāti dīvyata pati-kroḍe kuraṅgī-dṛśaḥ ||290||
GK19padyavlu:1527: kā vas tṛṣṇā valati hṛdaye durmadeyaṃ satīnām |
GK19padyavlu:1528: sīmantinyaḥ spṛhayata gṛhān mā viruddhaṃ kurudhvaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1529: nāyaṃ dṛṣṭau mama vighaṭate hanta puṇyasya panthāḥ || 291 ||
GK19padyavlu:1532: prasīda svāṃ śiṣyām atikhilamukhīṃ śādhi muralīm |
GK19padyavlu:1533: harantī maryādāṃ śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1534: nayantī dhṛṣṭeyaṃ yaduvara yathā nāhvayati naḥ ||292 ||
GK19padyavlu:1541: kālindyāḥ pulineṣu keli-kupitām utsṛjya rāse rasaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1547: tulasi vilasasi tvaṃ malli jātāsi phullā
GK19padyavlu:1549: kathayata bata sakhyaḥ kṣipram asmāsu kasmin
GK19padyavlu:1552: dṛṣṭaḥ kvāpi sa mādhavo vraja-vadhūm ādāya kāñcid gataḥ
GK19padyavlu:1553: sarvā eva hi vañcitāḥ sakhi vayaṃ so'nveṣaṇīyo yadi |
GK19padyavlu:1554: dve dve gacchatam ity udīrya sahasā rādhāṃ gṛhītvā kare
GK19padyavlu:1555: gopī-veśa-dharo nikuñja-kuharaṃ prāpto hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||296||
GK19padyavlu:1558: adoṣād doṣād vā tyajati vipine tāṃ yadi bhavān
GK19padyavlu:1559: abhadraṃ bhadraṃ vā tribhuvana-pate tvāṃ vadatu kaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1560: idaṃ tu krūraṃ me smarati hṛdayaṃ yat kila tayā
GK19padyavlu:1588: anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1589: vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ ||302||
GK19padyavlu:1591: (Amaru 55; SKM 2.140.5 keśaṭasya; Smv 86.14; SD 3.105 mada; Daśa 2.22, etc.; BRS 2.4.165)
GK19padyavlu:1599: saujanyena vaśīkṛtā vayam atas tvāṃ kiñcid ācakṣmahe
GK19padyavlu:1600: kālindīṃ yadi yāsi sundari punar mā gāḥ kadambāṭvaīm |
GK19padyavlu:1602: lagne locanasīmni notpaladṛśaḥ paśyantī patyur gṛham ||304||
GK19padyavlu:1604: śyāmo'yaṃ divasaḥ payoda-paṭalaiḥ sāyaṃ tathāpy utsukā
GK19padyavlu:1605: puṣpārthaṃ sakhi yāsi yāmuna-taṭaṃ yāhi vyathā kā mama |
GK19padyavlu:1606: kintv ekaṃ khara-kaṇṭaka-kakṣatam urasy ālokya sadyo'nyathā
GK19padyavlu:1607: śaṅkāṃ yat kuṭilaḥ kariṣyati jano jātāsmi tenākulā || 305 ||
GK19padyavlu:1609: gantavyā te manasi yamunā vartate cet tadānīṃ
GK19padyavlu:1610: kuñjaṃ mā gāḥ sahaja-sarale vāñjulaṃ mad-vacobhiḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1611: gacches tatrāpy ahaha yadi vā mā murārer udāre
GK19padyavlu:1624: sakhyo yayr gṛham ahaṃ kalasīṃ vahantī
GK19padyavlu:1627: mokṣyāmi jīvanam idaṃ sahasā puras te ||309||
GK19padyavlu:1630: valgantyā vana-mālayā tava hṛtaṃ vakṣojayoś candanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1632: klāntā svaira-taraṅga-kelibhir iyaṃ tanvī ca dhūrte tanuḥ
GK19padyavlu:1633: satyaṃ jalpasi bhānujām abhi rase magnādya harṣād abhūḥ ||310||
GK19padyavlu:1649: spaṣṭam eṣā rahasyatvāj jānadbhir api nocyate ||
GK19padyavlu:1650: tābhir nitya-vihāram eva tanute vṛndāvane mādhavo
GK19padyavlu:1651: goṣṭhāmbhojamukhībhir itya bhi manāk proce priyāyai haraḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1652: līlāratna-rahasyatā vrajapater bhūyasy aho paśya yat
GK19padyavlu:1653: tattvajño'pi purāntare ca gamanaṃ vyācaṣṭa vaiyāsakiḥ ||
GK19padyavlu:1654: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai vyājahāra haro rahaḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1658: sakhyaṃ tvayā vapur idaṃ gamitaṃ varākyāḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1662: prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhair ajasraṃ gataṃ
GK19padyavlu:1663: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇam āsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
GK19padyavlu:1664: gantuṃ niścita-cetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19padyavlu:1665: gantavye sati jīvita-priya-suhṛt-sārthaḥ kim u tyajyate || 314 ||
GK19padyavlu:1679: sāndrānandam anantam avyayam ajaṃ yad yogino'pi kṣaṇaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1680: sākṣāt kartum upāsate pratidinaṃ dhyānaikatānāḥ param |
GK19padyavlu:1681: dhanyās tā vrajavāsināṃ yuvatayas tad brahma yāḥ kautukād
GK19padyavlu:1695: gacchan dūram apekṣito muhur asau vyāvṛtya paśyann api |
GK19padyavlu:1696: tac chūnye punar āgatāsmi bhavane prāṇās ta eva sthitāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1697: sakhyaḥ paśyata jīvita-praṇayinī dambhād ahaṃ rodimi ||319|| rudraṭasya |
GK19padyavlu:1723: dalati hṛdayaṃ gāḍhodvegaṃ dvidhā na tu bhidyate
GK19padyavlu:1724: vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mūrcchāṃ na muñcati cetanām |
GK19padyavlu:1725: jvalayati tanūm antardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt
GK19padyavlu:1726: praharati vidhir marmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam ||325||
GK19padyavlu:1730: virahiṇi jane mūrcchāṃ labdhvā vinodayati vyathā-
GK19padyavlu:1731: makaruṇa punaḥ saṃjñā-vyādhiṃ vidhāya kim īhase || 326 ||
GK19padyavlu:1733: dṛṣṭaṃ ketaka-dhūli-dhūsaram idaṃ vyoma kramād vīkṣitāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1735: sakhyaḥ saṃvṛṇutāśru muñcata bhayaṃ kasmān mudevākulā
GK19padyavlu:1736: etān apy adhunāsmi vajraghaṭitā nūnaṃ sahiṣye dhanān ||327||
GK19padyavlu:1739: tad yāmunaṃ taṭam idaṃ vipinaṃ tad etat |
GK19padyavlu:1760: kiṃ tv ekam eva mama duḥkham abhūd analpaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1761: prāṇeśvareṇa sahito yad ayaṃ na yātaḥ ||332|||
GK19padyavlu:1764: rakṣāmi jīvam avadhir niyato yadi syāt |
GK19padyavlu:1766: yat kāla-kūṭam asṛjat tad idaṃ kim artham ||333||
GK19padyavlu:1769: prakaṭaya śaśinn āśāḥ kāmaṃ manoja samullasa |
GK19padyavlu:1771: hṛdayam adhunā kiñcit kartuṃ mamānyad ihecchati ||334 ||
GK19padyavlu:1773: nāyāti ced yadupatiḥ sakhi naitu kāmaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1775: ekaḥ paraṃ hṛdi mahān mama vajra-pāto
GK19padyavlu:1776: bhūyo yad induvadanaṃ na vilokitaṃ tat || 335 ||

GK19padyavlu:1879: aṃse veṇī kuca-parisare candanaṃ vāci maunaṃ
